course.subject: MGMT
course.name: Advanced Topics in Strategic Management
course.description: This doctoral seminar focuses on the development of strategic management research. Through in-depth discussion of readings in the field of strategic management, we focus on developing ideas for a research proposal in terms of theory development and research design. The workshop not only develops studentsâ€™ research skills hands-on, but also helps them to advance their research agendas such as developing a proposal for a potential paper targeted to a leading journal.
